template.name: Ignite by JMX
template.description:
The template to monitor Apache Ignite by Zabbix that work without any external scripts. It works with both standalone and cluster instances. The metrics are discoverable and collected by JMX. Current JMX tree hierarchy contains classloader by default. Add the following jvm option `-DIGNITE_MBEAN_APPEND_CLASS_LOADER_ID=false`to will exclude one level with Classloader name. You can set {$IGNITE.USER} and {$IGNITE.PASSWORD} macros in the template for using on the host level.
You can discuss this template or leave feedback on our forum https://www.zabbix.com/forum/zabbix-suggestions-and-feedback/
Template tooling version used: 0.41

item_prototype.name: Data region {#JMXNAME}: Allocation, rate
item_prototype.description: Allocation rate (pages per second) averaged across rateTimeInternal.

item_prototype.name: Data region {#JMXNAME}: Checkpoint buffer size
item_prototype.description: Total size in bytes for checkpoint buffer.

item_prototype.name: Data region {#JMXNAME}: Dirty pages
item_prototype.description: Number of pages in memory not yet synchronized with persistent storage.

item_prototype.name: Data region {#JMXNAME}: Eviction, rate
item_prototype.description: Eviction rate (pages per second).

trigger_prototype.name: Data region {#JMXNAME}: Node started to evict pages
trigger_prototype.description: You store more data than region can accommodate. Data started to move to disk it can make requests work slower. Ack to close.

item_prototype.name: Data region {#JMXNAME}: Size, max
item_prototype.description: Maximum memory region size defined by its data region.

item_prototype.name: Data region {#JMXNAME}: Offheap size
item_prototype.description: Offheap size in bytes.

item_prototype.name: Data region {#JMXNAME}: Offheap used size
item_prototype.description: Total used offheap size in bytes.

item_prototype.name: Data region {#JMXNAME}: Pages fill factor
item_prototype.description: The percentage of the used space.

item_prototype.name: Data region {#JMXNAME}: Pages replace, rate
item_prototype.description: Rate at which pages in memory are replaced with pages from persistent storage (pages per second).

trigger_prototype.name: Data region {#JMXNAME}: Pages replace rate more than 0
trigger_prototype.description: There is more data than DataRegionMaxSize. Cluster started to replace pages in memory. Page replacement can slow down operations.

item_prototype.name: Data region {#JMXNAME}: Allocated, bytes
item_prototype.description: Total size of memory allocated in bytes.

item_prototype.name: Data region {#JMXNAME}: Used checkpoint buffer size
item_prototype.description: Used checkpoint buffer size in bytes.

trigger_prototype.name: Data region {#JMXNAME}: Checkpoint buffer utilization is too high
trigger_prototype.event_name: Data region {#JMXNAME}: Checkpoint buffer utilization is too high (over {$IGNITE.CHECKPOINT.PUSED.MAX.HIGH} in 5m)
trigger_prototype.description: Checkpoint buffer utilization is high. Threads will be throttled to avoid buffer overflow. It can be caused by high disk utilization.

trigger_prototype.name: Data region {#JMXNAME}: Checkpoint buffer utilization is too high
trigger_prototype.event_name: Data region {#JMXNAME}: Checkpoint buffer utilization is too high (over {$IGNITE.CHECKPOINT.PUSED.MAX.WARN} in 5m)
trigger_prototype.description: Checkpoint buffer utilization is high. Threads will be throttled to avoid buffer overflow. It can be caused by high disk utilization.

dependency.name: Data region {#JMXNAME}: Checkpoint buffer utilization is too high

trigger_prototype.name: Data region {#JMXNAME}: Data region utilization is too high
trigger_prototype.event_name: Data region {#JMXNAME}: Data region utilization is too high (over {$IGNITE.DATA.REGION.PUSED.MAX.HIGH} in 5m)
trigger_prototype.description: Data region utilization is high. Increase data region size or delete any data.

trigger_prototype.name: Data region {#JMXNAME}: Data region utilization is too high
trigger_prototype.event_name: Data region {#JMXNAME}: Data region utilization is too high (over {$IGNITE.DATA.REGION.PUSED.MAX.WARN} in 5m)
trigger_prototype.description: Data region utilization is high. Increase data region size or delete any data.

dependency.name: Data region {#JMXNAME}: Data region utilization is too high

item_prototype.name: Ignite [{#JMXIGNITEINSTANCENAME}]: Jobs active, current
item_prototype.description: Number of currently active jobs concurrently executing on the node.

item_prototype.name: Ignite [{#JMXIGNITEINSTANCENAME}]: Jobs cancelled, current
item_prototype.description: Number of cancelled jobs that are still running.

item_prototype.name: Ignite [{#JMXIGNITEINSTANCENAME}]: PME duration, current
item_prototype.description: Current PME duration in milliseconds.

trigger_prototype.name: Ignite [{#JMXIGNITEINSTANCENAME}]: PME duration is too long
trigger_prototype.event_name: Ignite [{#JMXIGNITEINSTANCENAME}]: PME duration is too long (over {$IGNITE.PME.DURATION.MAX.HIGH} for 5 min)
trigger_prototype.description: PME duration is over {$IGNITE.PME.DURATION.MAX.HIGH}ms. Looks like PME is hung.

trigger_prototype.name: Ignite [{#JMXIGNITEINSTANCENAME}]: PME duration is too long
trigger_prototype.event_name: Ignite [{#JMXIGNITEINSTANCENAME}]: PME duration is too long (over {$IGNITE.PME.DURATION.MAX.WARN} for 5 min)
trigger_prototype.description: PME duration is over {$IGNITE.PME.DURATION.MAX.WARN}ms.

dependency.name: Ignite [{#JMXIGNITEINSTANCENAME}]: PME duration is too long

item_prototype.name: Ignite [{#JMXIGNITEINSTANCENAME}]: Jobs rejected, current
item_prototype.description: Number of jobs rejected after more recent collision resolution operation.

item_prototype.name: Ignite [{#JMXIGNITEINSTANCENAME}]: Threads count, current
item_prototype.description: Current number of live threads.

trigger_prototype.name: Ignite [{#JMXIGNITEINSTANCENAME}]: Number of running threads is too high
trigger_prototype.event_name: Ignite [{#JMXIGNITEINSTANCENAME}]: Number of running threads is too high (over {$IGNITE.THREADS.COUNT.MAX.WARN} for 15 min)
trigger_prototype.description: Number of running threads is over {$IGNITE.THREADS.COUNT.MAX.WARN}.

dependency.name: Ignite [{#JMXIGNITEINSTANCENAME}]: PME duration is too long

item_prototype.name: Ignite [{#JMXIGNITEINSTANCENAME}]: Jobs waiting, current
item_prototype.description: Number of queued jobs currently waiting to be executed.

trigger_prototype.name: Ignite [{#JMXIGNITEINSTANCENAME}]: Number of queued jobs is too high
trigger_prototype.event_name: Ignite [{#JMXIGNITEINSTANCENAME}]: Number of queued jobs is too high (over {$IGNITE.JOBS.QUEUE.MAX.WARN} for 15 min)
trigger_prototype.description: Number of queued jobs is over {$IGNITE.JOBS.QUEUE.MAX.WARN}.

item_prototype.name: Ignite [{#JMXIGNITEINSTANCENAME}]: Heap memory used
item_prototype.description: Current heap size that is used for object allocation.

item_prototype.name: Ignite [{#JMXIGNITEINSTANCENAME}]: Jobs cancelled, rate
item_prototype.description: Total number of jobs cancelled by the node per second.

item_prototype.name: Ignite [{#JMXIGNITEINSTANCENAME}]: Jobs executed, rate
item_prototype.description: Total number of jobs handled by the node per second.

item_prototype.name: Ignite [{#JMXIGNITEINSTANCENAME}]: Jobs rejects, rate
item_prototype.description: Total number of jobs this node rejects during collision resolution operations since node startup per second.

item_prototype.name: Ignite [{#JMXIGNITEINSTANCENAME}]: Nodes, Active baseline
item_prototype.description: The number of nodes that are currently active in the baseline topology.

item_prototype.name: Ignite [{#JMXIGNITEINSTANCENAME}]: Nodes, Baseline
item_prototype.description: Total baseline nodes that are registered in the baseline topology.

item_prototype.name: Ignite [{#JMXIGNITEINSTANCENAME}]: Nodes, Client
item_prototype.description: The number of client nodes in the cluster.

item_prototype.name: Ignite [{#JMXIGNITEINSTANCENAME}]: Nodes, total
item_prototype.description: Total number of nodes.

item_prototype.name: Ignite [{#JMXIGNITEINSTANCENAME}]: Nodes, Server
item_prototype.description: The number of server nodes in the cluster.

trigger_prototype.name: Ignite [{#JMXIGNITEINSTANCENAME}]: Server node added to the topology
trigger_prototype.description: One or more server node added to the topology. Ack to close.

trigger_prototype.name: Ignite [{#JMXIGNITEINSTANCENAME}]: Server node left the topology
trigger_prototype.description: One or more server node left the topology. Ack to close.

trigger_prototype.name: Ignite [{#JMXIGNITEINSTANCENAME}]: There are nodes is not in topology
trigger_prototype.description: One or more server node left the topology. Ack to close.

item_prototype.name: Ignite [{#JMXIGNITEINSTANCENAME}]: Version
item_prototype.description: Version of Ignite instance.

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Ignite by JMX/jmx["{#JMXOBJ}",FullVersion],#1)<>last(/Ignite by JMX/jmx["{#JMXOBJ}",FullVersion],#2) and length(last(/Ignite by JMX/jmx["{#JMXOBJ}",FullVersion]))>0
trigger_prototype.name: Ignite [{#JMXIGNITEINSTANCENAME}]: Version has changed
trigger_prototype.description: Ignite [{#JMXIGNITEINSTANCENAME}] version has changed. Ack to close.

item_prototype.name: Ignite [{#JMXIGNITEINSTANCENAME}]: Local node ID
item_prototype.description: Unique identifier for this node within grid.

item_prototype.name: Ignite [{#JMXIGNITEINSTANCENAME}]: Uptime
item_prototype.description: Uptime of Ignite instance.

trigger_prototype.name: Ignite [{#JMXIGNITEINSTANCENAME}]: Failed to fetch info data
trigger_prototype.event_name: Ignite [{#JMXIGNITEINSTANCENAME}]: Failed to fetch info data (or no data for 10m)
trigger_prototype.description: Zabbix has not received data for items for the last 10 minutes.

trigger_prototype.name: Ignite [{#JMXIGNITEINSTANCENAME}]: has been restarted
trigger_prototype.description: Uptime is less than 10 minutes

item_prototype.name: Ignite [{#JMXIGNITEINSTANCENAME}]: Communication outbound messages queue
item_prototype.description: Outbound messages queue size.

item_prototype.name: Ignite [{#JMXIGNITEINSTANCENAME}]: Communication messages received, rate
item_prototype.description: The number of messages received per second.

item_prototype.name: Ignite [{#JMXIGNITEINSTANCENAME}]: Communication messages sent, rate
item_prototype.description: The number of messages sent per second.

item_prototype.name: Ignite [{#JMXIGNITEINSTANCENAME}]: Coordinator
item_prototype.description: Current coordinator UUID.

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Ignite by JMX/jmx["{#JMXOBJ}",Coordinator],#1)<>last(/Ignite by JMX/jmx["{#JMXOBJ}",Coordinator],#2) and length(last(/Ignite by JMX/jmx["{#JMXOBJ}",Coordinator]))>0
trigger_prototype.name: Ignite [{#JMXIGNITEINSTANCENAME}]: Coordinator has changed
trigger_prototype.description: Ignite [{#JMXIGNITEINSTANCENAME}] version has changed. Ack to close.

item_prototype.name: Ignite [{#JMXIGNITEINSTANCENAME}]: Discovery message worker queue
item_prototype.description: Message worker queue current size.

item_prototype.name: Ignite [{#JMXIGNITEINSTANCENAME}]: Nodes failed
item_prototype.description: Nodes failed count.

item_prototype.name: Ignite [{#JMXIGNITEINSTANCENAME}]: Nodes joined
item_prototype.description: Nodes join count.

item_prototype.name: Ignite [{#JMXIGNITEINSTANCENAME}]: Nodes left
item_prototype.description: Nodes left count.

item_prototype.name: Ignite [{#JMXIGNITEINSTANCENAME}]: Discovery reconnect, rate
item_prototype.description: Number of times node tries to (re)establish connection to another node per second.

item_prototype.name: Ignite [{#JMXIGNITEINSTANCENAME}]: TotalProcessedMessages
item_prototype.description: The number of messages received per second.

item_prototype.name: Ignite [{#JMXIGNITEINSTANCENAME}]: Discovery messages received, rate
item_prototype.description: The number of messages processed per second.

item_prototype.name: Ignite [{#JMXIGNITEINSTANCENAME}]: Locked keys
item_prototype.description: The number of keys locked on the node.

item_prototype.name: Ignite [{#JMXIGNITEINSTANCENAME}]: Transactions owner, current
item_prototype.description: The number of active transactions for which this node is the initiator.

item_prototype.name: Ignite [{#JMXIGNITEINSTANCENAME}]: Transactions committed, rate
item_prototype.description: The number of transactions which were committed per second.

item_prototype.name: Ignite [{#JMXIGNITEINSTANCENAME}]: Transactions holding lock, current
item_prototype.description: The number of active transactions holding at least one key lock.

item_prototype.name: Ignite [{#JMXIGNITEINSTANCENAME}]: Transactions rolledback, rate
item_prototype.description: The number of transactions which were rollback per second.

item_prototype.name: Cache group [{#JMXNAME}]: Backups
item_prototype.description: Count of backups configured for cache group.

item_prototype.name: Cache group [{#JMXNAME}]: Caches
item_prototype.description: List of caches.

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Ignite by JMX/jmx["{#JMXOBJ}",Caches],#1)<>last(/Ignite by JMX/jmx["{#JMXOBJ}",Caches],#2) and length(last(/Ignite by JMX/jmx["{#JMXOBJ}",Caches]))>0
trigger_prototype.name: Cache group [{#JMXNAME}]: List of caches has changed
trigger_prototype.event_name: Cache group [{#JMXNAME}]: Version has changed (new version: {ITEM.VALUE})
trigger_prototype.description: List of caches has changed. Significant changes have occurred in the cluster. Ack to close.

item_prototype.name: Cache group [{#JMXNAME}]: Local node partitions, moving
item_prototype.description: Count of partitions with state MOVING for this cache group located on this node.

trigger_prototype.name: Cache group [{#JMXNAME}]: Rebalance in progress
trigger_prototype.description: Ack to close.

item_prototype.name: Cache group [{#JMXNAME}]: Local node partitions, owning
item_prototype.description: Count of partitions with state OWNING for this cache group located on this node.

item_prototype.name: Cache group [{#JMXNAME}]: Local node entries, renting
item_prototype.description: Count of entries remains to evict in RENTING partitions located on this node for this cache group.

item_prototype.name: Cache group [{#JMXNAME}]: Local node partitions, renting
item_prototype.description: Count of partitions with state RENTING for this cache group located on this node.

item_prototype.name: Cache group [{#JMXNAME}]: Partition copies, max
item_prototype.description: Maximum number of partition copies for all partitions of this cache group.

item_prototype.name: Cache group [{#JMXNAME}]: Partition copies, min
item_prototype.description: Minimum number of partition copies for all partitions of this cache group.

trigger_prototype.name: Cache group [{#JMXNAME}]: There is no copy for partitions

item_prototype.name: Cache group [{#JMXNAME}]: Partitions
item_prototype.description: Count of partitions for cache group.

trigger_prototype.name: Cache group [{#JMXNAME}]: One or more backups are unavailable

item_prototype.name: Thread pool [{#JMXNAME}]: Pool size, core
item_prototype.description: The core number of threads.

item_prototype.name: Thread pool [{#JMXNAME}]: Pool size, max
item_prototype.description: The maximum allowed number of threads.

item_prototype.name: Thread pool [{#JMXNAME}]: Pool size
item_prototype.description: Current number of threads in the pool.

item_prototype.name: Thread pool [{#JMXNAME}]: Queue size
item_prototype.description: Current size of the execution queue.

trigger_prototype.name: Thread pool [{#JMXNAME}]: Too many messages in queue
trigger_prototype.event_name: Thread pool [{#JMXNAME}]: Too many messages in queue (over {$IGNITE.THREAD.QUEUE.MAX.WARN:"{#JMXNAME}"} for 5 min)
trigger_prototype.description: Number of messages in queue more than {$IGNITE.THREAD.QUEUE.MAX.WARN:"{#JMXNAME}"}.

item_prototype.name: Cache group [{#JMXGROUP}]: Cache gets, rate
item_prototype.description: The number of gets to the cache per second.

item_prototype.name: Cache group [{#JMXGROUP}]: Cache hits, pct
item_prototype.description: Percentage of successful hits.

item_prototype.name: Cache group [{#JMXGROUP}]: Cache misses, pct
item_prototype.description: Percentage of accesses that failed to find anything.

item_prototype.name: Cache group [{#JMXGROUP}]: Cache puts, rate
item_prototype.description: The number of puts to the cache per second.

item_prototype.name: Cache group [{#JMXGROUP}]: Cache removals, rate
item_prototype.description: The number of removals from the cache per second.

item_prototype.name: Cache group [{#JMXGROUP}]: Cache size
item_prototype.description: The number of non-null values in the cache as a long value.

item_prototype.name: Cache group [{#JMXGROUP}]: Cache transaction commits, rate
item_prototype.description: The number of transaction commits per second.

item_prototype.name: Cache group [{#JMXGROUP}]: Cache transaction rollbacks, rate
item_prototype.description: The number of transaction rollback per second.

item_prototype.name: Cache group [{#JMXGROUP}]: Cache heap entries
item_prototype.description: The number of entries in heap memory.

trigger_prototype.name: Cache group [{#JMXGROUP}]: All entries are in heap
trigger_prototype.description: All entries are in heap. Possibly you use eager queries it may cause out of memory exceptions for big caches. Ack to close.

trigger_prototype.expression: min(/Ignite by JMX/jmx["{#JMXOBJ}",CacheTxRollbacks],5m) > max(/Ignite by JMX/jmx["{#JMXOBJ}",CacheTxCommits],5m)
trigger_prototype.name: Cache group [{#JMXGROUP}]: Success transactions less than rollbacks for 5m

dependency.name: Cache group [{#JMXGROUP}]: There are no success transactions for cache for 5m
dependency.expression: min(/Ignite by JMX/jmx["{#JMXOBJ}",CacheTxRollbacks],5m)>0 and max(/Ignite by JMX/jmx["{#JMXOBJ}",CacheTxCommits],5m)=0

trigger_prototype.expression: min(/Ignite by JMX/jmx["{#JMXOBJ}",CacheTxRollbacks],5m)>0 and max(/Ignite by JMX/jmx["{#JMXOBJ}",CacheTxCommits],5m)=0
trigger_prototype.name: Cache group [{#JMXGROUP}]: There are no success transactions for cache for 5m

macro.description: The maximum percent of checkpoint buffer utilization for high trigger expression.
The maximum percent of checkpoint buffer utilization for warning trigger expression.
The maximum percent of data region utilization for high trigger expression.
The maximum percent of data region utilization for warning trigger expression.
The maximum number of queued jobs for trigger expression.
Filter to exclude discovered cache groups.
Filter to exclude discovered data regions.
Filter to exclude discovered thread pools.
The maximum PME duration in ms for high trigger expression.
The maximum PME duration in ms for warning trigger expression.
Threshold for thread pool queue size. Can be used with thread pool name as context.
The maximum number of running threads for trigger expression.
